verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, A Psalm of David <S%H1732><s%>, to bring to remembrance <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8687><s%>. Make haste, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, to deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8687><s%> me; make haste <S%H2363><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to help <S%H5833><s%> me, O YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Let them be ashamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and confounded <S%H2659><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8764><s%> after my soul <S%H5315><s%>: let them be turned <S%H5472><s%> <S%H8735><s%> backward <S%H268><s%>, and put to confusion <S%H3637><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, that desire <S%H2655><s%> my hurt <S%H7451><s%>.
Let them be turned back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for a reward <S%H6118><s%> of their shame <S%H1322><s%> that say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, Aha <S%H1889><s%>, aha <S%H1889><s%>.

Let all those that seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee rejoice <S%H7797><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in thee: and let such as love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thy salvation <S%H3444><s%> say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>, Let 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> be magnified <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

But I am poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>: make haste <S%H2363><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto me, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: thou art my help <S%H5828><s%> and my deliverer <S%H6403><s%> <S%H8764><s%>; O YY <S%H3068><s%>, make no tarrying <S%H309><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.
